name: Tenrow
description: Tenrow is a logic puzzle game. Includes 50 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (Prescott) or later Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
